execution_quality: Agent efficiently read the CV file and provided a review, demonstrating appropriate use of tools and focused analysis of the requested document.
work_category: CV review task requiring examination of an org-mode resume document to assess content, structure, and recommendations.
summary: Agent successfully reviewed the CV by reading the file and providing substantive feedback. User's follow-up question about section removal indicates the review was helpful and prompted constructive thinking about document structure and content.
follow_up_pattern: User asked a clarifying question about removing sections (first section + Claude Code projects) rather than providing corrections, suggesting they were engaging constructively with the review.
